# Text List



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                                      | Type                             | Default       |
| ----------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------- | ------------- |
| `listType`  | `list-type`  | The type of the text list.                                                                       | `"ordered" or "unordered"`       | `'unordered'` |
| `orderType` | `order-type` | The list style type of an ordered list.                                                          | `"alphabetically" or "numbered"` | `'numbered'`  |
| `theme`     | `theme`      | Adapts the text color depending on the theme. Has no effect when "inherit" is set as color prop. | `"dark" or "light"`              | `'light'`     |
